all over again.translation[0].definition: if you do something all over again, you repeat it from the beginning
I had to write the essay all over again.
all over again.translation[1].definition: used to emphasize that you do the whole of something again from the beginning, or that the same thing happens again
Their first plan had gone wrong, so they had to start all over again.
We had quarrelled about the money before, and now it was happening all over again.
